content.title: Home - Mayo Clinic Health System
content.description: As part of Mayo Clinic, our clinics, hospitals and healthcare facilities serve communities in Iowa, Wisconsin and Minnesota.

<style type="text/css">input[type="checkbox"][name="mayo-preferences"] {
  -webkit-appearance: checkbox;
  -moz-appearance: checkbox;
  -ms-appearance: checkbox;
  -o-appearance: checkbox;
  appearance: checkbox;
}
.mayo-privacy-popup {
  border-radius: 10px;
  background-color: #3c3a35;
  bottom: 50px;
  max-width: 800px;
}
.mayo-privacy-popup .mayo-close-btn {
  color: #fff;
}
@media screen and (max-width: 767px) {
  .mayo-privacy-popup {
    bottom: 0;
    border-radius: 0;
  }
}
.mayo-privacy-popup > p {
  color: #EDEDED;
}
.mayo-privacy-popup > p a {
  color: #fff;
}
@media screen and (max-width: 767px) {
  .mayo-privacy-popup > p {
    font-size: 13px !important;
  }
}
.mayo-priv-pref {
  background-color: #fff;
  border: 1px solid #000;
  box-shadow: 5px 5px 5px rgba(128, 128, 128, 0.6);
  top: 3%;
}
.mayo-priv-pref .mayo-close-btn {
  color: #3c3a35;
}
.mayo-priv-pref:after {
  position: fixed;
  content: "";
  top: 0;
  left: 0;
  bottom: 0;
  right: 0;
  background: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.5);
  z-index: -2;
}
.mayo-priv-pref:before {
  position: absolute;
  content: "";
  top: 0;
  left: 0;
  bottom: 0;
  right: 0;
  background: #FFF;
  z-index: -1;
}
@media screen and (max-width: 767px) {
  .mayo-priv-pref {
    bottom: inherit;
    top: 0;
  }
}
.mayo-priv-pref h2 {
  color: #a9a8a5;
  font-size: 18px;
  text-align: center;
}
.mayo-priv-pref p {
  font-size: 13px;
  padding-bottom: 10px;
}
.mayo-priv-pref .mayo-privacy-box {
  border-top: 2px solid #a9a8a5;
  margin: 8px 0;
  padding: 5px 0;
  display: flex;
}
.mayo-priv-pref .mayo-privacy-box > div {
  margin-top: 18px;
}
.mayo-priv-pref .mayo-privacy-box > div label, .mayo-priv-pref .mayo-privacy-box > div .label {
  font-family: Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;
  font-size: 16px;
  font-weight: bold;
  color: #000;
  margin: 0 0 3px 8px;
  line-height: 24px;
  padding: 0;
}
@media screen and (max-width: 767px) {
  .mayo-priv-pref .mayo-privacy-box > div label, .mayo-priv-pref .mayo-privacy-box > div .label {
    font-size: 13px !important;
  }
}
.mayo-priv-pref .mayo-privacy-box > div label + p, .mayo-priv-pref .mayo-privacy-box > div .label + p {
  margin: 0 0 0 8px;
}
.mayo-priv-pref .mayo-privacy-box h3 {
  display: inline-block;
  font-size: 16px;
  font-weight: bold;
}
.mayo-priv-pref .mayo-privacy-box.btns {
  text-align: right;
  padding-top: 18px;
  margin-bottom: 0;
}
.mayo-privacy-popup,
.mayo-priv-pref {
  box-sizing: border-box;
  padding: 20px 25px 20px 20px;
  position: fixed;
  max-width: 700px;
  left: calc( (100% - 700px) / 2 );
  z-index: 3000000;
}
.mayo-privacy-popup .mayo-close-btn,
.mayo-priv-pref .mayo-close-btn {
  cursor: pointer;
  position: absolute;
  top: 8px;
  right: 8px;
  font-weight: bold;
  font-size: 16px;
  background-color: transparent;
  border: none;
  height: 20px;
  width: 20px;
}
.mayo-privacy-popup[aria-hidden="true"],
.mayo-priv-pref[aria-hidden="true"] {
  display: none;
}
.mayo-privacy-popup h3,
.mayo-priv-pref h3 {
  font-family: Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;
  font-size: 16px;
  margin: 0 0 13px;
  color: #111;
  font-weight: bold;
  line-height: 24px;
  margin: 0;
  padding: 0;
}
.mayo-privacy-popup h2,
.mayo-priv-pref h2 {
  font-family: Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;
  font-size: 22px;
  margin: 0 0 13px;
  color: #111;
  line-height: 26px;
  margin: 0;
  padding: 0;
}
.mayo-privacy-popup h2.hide-title,
.mayo-priv-pref h2.hide-title {
  border: 0;
  clip: rect(0 0 0 0);
  height: 1px;
  margin: -1px;
  overflow: hidden;
  padding: 0;
  position: absolute;
  width: 1px;
}
.mayo-privacy-popup p,
.mayo-priv-pref p {
  font-family: Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;
  font-size: 16px;
  display: block;
  line-height: 24px;
  margin: 5px 0;
  padding: 0;
}
@media screen and (max-width: 767px) {
  .mayo-privacy-popup p,
  .mayo-priv-pref p {
    font-size: 13px !important;
  }
}
.mayo-privacy-popup a,
.mayo-priv-pref a {
  text-decoration: underline;
}
.mayo-privacy-popup a:hover,
.mayo-priv-pref a:hover {
  color: #fff;
  text-decoration: underline;
}
.mayo-privacy-popup .mayo-primary-button,
.mayo-priv-pref .mayo-primary-button {
  border-radius: 14px;
  padding: 14px 28px;
  text-align: center;
  font-family: Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;
  font-size: 16px;
  line-height: 24px;
  height: auto;
  letter-spacing: initial;
  font-weight: normal;
  text-transform: none
}
.mayo-privacy-popup .mayo-primary-button,
.mayo-priv-pref .mayo-primary-button {
  background-color: #003da5;
  border: 1px solid #003da5;
  color: #fff;
}
.mayo-privacy-popup .mayo-primary-button:focus,
.mayo-priv-pref .mayo-primary-button:focus {
  border: 1px solid #fff;
}
.mayo-privacy-popup .mayo-primary-button:hover,
.mayo-priv-pref .mayo-primary-button:hover {
  cursor: pointer;
}
.mayo-privacy-popup .mayo-button-container,
.mayo-priv-pref .mayo-button-container {
  overflow: hidden;
  text-align: right;
}
@media screen and (max-width: 767px) {
  .mayo-privacy-popup .mayo-button-container,
  .mayo-priv-pref .mayo-button-container {
    margin-top: 12px;
    text-align: left;
  }
}
@media screen and (max-width: 767px) {
  .mayo-privacy-popup,
  .mayo-priv-pref {
    width: 100%;
    max-width: inherit;
    left: 0;
    -webkit-transform: inherit;
    transform: inherit;
    margin-left: 0;
  }
}
@media screen and (max-width: 767px) {
  .mayo-priv-pref {
    margin-left: 0;
    position: fixed;
    top: 0;
    width: 100%;
  }
}



html[lang="ar"] .mayo-privacy-popup .mayo-button-container, html[lang="ar"] .mayo-priv-pref .mayo-button-container {
	text-align: right;
}

@media screen and (max-width: 767px) {
	html[lang="ar"] .mayo-privacy-popup .mayo-button-container, html[lang="ar"] .mayo-priv-pref .mayo-button-container {
		text-align: left;
	}
}

html[lang="ar"] .mayo-privacy-popup .mayo-close-btn, html[lang="ar"] .mayo-priv-pref .mayo-close-btn {
	right: auto;
	left: 8px;
}

html[lang="ar"] .mayo-priv-pref .mayo-privacy-box > div label, html[lang="ar"] .mayo-priv-pref .mayo-privacy-box > div .label {
	margin-left: 0;
	margin-right: 8px;
}

Please visit our <a href="https://www.mayoclinic.org/about-this-site/privacy-policy">Privacy Policy</a> for more information about our use of data and your rights.</p> 	<p><a href="#/" id="mayo-privacy-update-preferences" class="un-link" aria-haspopup="true" aria-control="mayo-pref-popup" onclick="Bootstrapper.gateway.closeBannerCustom();Bootstrapper.gateway.openModalCustom();">Click here to update your preferences</a></p> 	<div class="mayo-button-container"> 		<button type="button" id="mayo-privacy-opt-in" class="mayo-primary-button" onclick="Bootstrapper.gateway.closeBannerCustom();Bootstrapper.gateway.closeBannerOptInCustom()">I Agree</button> 	</div> </div><div class="mayo-priv-pref" role="dialog" aria-labelledby="mayo-pref-title" aria-describedby="mayo-privacy-pref" aria-hidden="true" id="mayo-pref-popup"> 	<button id="mayo-privacy-close" class="mayo-close-btn" type="button" onclick="Bootstrapper.gateway.closeModalCustom()">x</button> 	<h2 class="" id="mayo-pref-title">Customize Cookie Settings</h2> 	<div class="mayo-privacy-box"> 		<div> 			<span class="label">Trusted</span> 			<p>These technologies are used in operating the site, including remembering your preferences, ensuring security and providing certain features. Specialty caremade personal.

Appointment Requests

Schedule your appointment now for safe, in-person care or take advantage of our virtual care options.
Request an Appointment

Heart Health

Show your heart some love with cardiovascular care. From prevention to treatment, get the exact care you need.
Love Your Heart

Video visits 24/7/365

Our new mobile app connects you with a provider anytime, day or night, including weekends and holidays.

Why Choose Mayo Clinic Health System

Mayo Clinic Care

By working together and sharing the knowledge and expertise that only Mayo Clinic can provide, we bring the experience and specialized care of Mayo Clinic to you.

Convenient

Every aspect of your care is coordinated, and teams of experts work together to provide exactly the right care at the right time in the right place.

Close to Home

With so many locations, you won’t have to travel far to get the care you need; some care can even be delivered through virtual appointments.

Diverse and Inclusive Care

We're committed to transformational change to reduce health care disparities and create an empowered, diverse and inspired workforce who are dedicated to the health and well-being of our communities.
Learn About Our Values

Quality and Innovation

We understand what it means to bear the name of the nation’s No. 1 hospital, which is why we deliver patient care that meets Mayo Clinic's standards for safety and quality.
View Our Recognitions

What’s Happening In the Community

It's OK to say 'yes' to potatoes

Potatoes have gotten a bad rap for their carb content. Learn why they're good for you, and get recipes to bring the comfort of potatoes to a healthy diet.

June 10, 2025

Maintaining healthy relationships with age

Maintaining relationships and strong social networks as you age can contribute to a longer, healthier life. Read why having positive relationships is as important for health as nutrition and exercise.

May 15, 2025

The sound of success: How improved hearing aids career change

Charlie Pierce was ready to make a career change, but hearing loss was an obstacle to being accepted for the new position. Learn how his Audiology team gave him a fresh start with a small pair of hearing aids.

May 1, 2025

Eating healthy on a budget

Food budget getting squeezed? These tips can help you save money without pinching your healthy eating goals.

April 24, 2025

Want to reduce chronic inflammation? Start with your grocery list

Chronic inflammation can damage your body, but eating a combination of healthy foods can reduce its effects. Learn what foods to choose when you shop.

By Susan Block April 24, 2025

Know your numbers: Cholesterol

You can lower your risk of heart disease, stroke and peripheral artery disease by keeping your cholesterol at normal levels. Here's what you need to know.

April 24, 2025

The wonders of watermelon

Watermelon is a staple at many summertime picnics and gatherings around the country. While most people agree watermelon tastes good, a majority are unaware of the many health benefits this wonderful fruit contains.

By Kristi Wempen April 24, 2025

Is it healthy to eat eggs every day? Crack open the facts

Are you weighing the health benefits of eggs? Learn what nutrients are packed inside the shell and how eggs can be a healthy, versatile choice for any meal of the day.

April 24, 2025

![Man with comforting smile hugging a person](https://www.mayoclinichealthsystem.org/-/media/health-system-internet/hero-banner/desktop/home-page/specialty-care-made-personal-home.jpg?sc_lang=en&la=en&h=350&w=1920&hash=D073B53B017BB5A3B6FC2DF9C49E0B6C)
# **Specialty care** made personal.
[![Woman typing at laptop](https://www.mayoclinichealthsystem.org/-/media/health-system-internet/components/navigation-cards/homepage/request-an-appointment.jpg?sc_lang=en&la=en&h=300&w=450&hash=37814EF7721C055B516F857AB0AAACF4)](https://www.mayoclinichealthsystem.org/request-appointment "Request an Appointment")
##  Appointment Requests 
Schedule your appointment now for safe, in-person care or take advantage of our virtual care options. 
[Request an Appointment](https://www.mayoclinichealthsystem.org/request-appointment "Request an Appointment")
[![Person leaning against wire fence smiling.](https://www.mayoclinichealthsystem.org/-/media/health-system-internet/components/navigation-cards/homepage/heart-health.jpg?sc_lang=en&la=en&h=300&w=450&hash=0CBB2EEA555FCBF30B4AC6D371FC7FB3)](https://www.mayoclinichealthsystem.org/services-and-treatments/cardiology)
##  Heart Health 
Show your heart some love with cardiovascular care. From prevention to treatment, get the exact care you need. 
[Love Your Heart](https://www.mayoclinichealthsystem.org/services-and-treatments/cardiology)
##  Video visits 24/7/365 
Our new mobile app connects you with a provider anytime, day or night, including weekends and holidays. 
##  Why Choose Mayo Clinic Health System 
###  Mayo Clinic Care 
By working together and sharing the knowledge and expertise that only Mayo Clinic can provide, we bring the experience and specialized care of Mayo Clinic to you. 
###  Convenient 
Every aspect of your care is coordinated, and teams of experts work together to provide exactly the right care at the right time in the right place. 
###  Close to Home 
With so many locations, you won’t have to travel far to get the care you need; some care can even be delivered through virtual appointments. 
![Diverse and Inclusive Care](https://www.mayoclinichealthsystem.org/-/media/health-system-internet/components/ad-cards/diverse-and-inclusive-care.jpg?sc_lang=en&la=en&h=310&w=510&hash=07C2F763B030D7EFF1C62C124A31DA54)
##  Diverse and Inclusive Care 
We're committed to transformational change to reduce health care disparities and create an empowered, diverse and inspired workforce who are dedicated to the health and well-being of our communities. 
[Learn About Our Values](https://www.mayoclinichealthsystem.org/about-us/diverse-and-inclusive-care "Diverse and Inclusive Care")
![Quality and Innovation](https://www.mayoclinichealthsystem.org/-/media/health-system-internet/components/ad-cards/quality-and-innovation.jpg?sc_lang=en&la=en&h=310&w=510&hash=FC36C2186BD485FB4B086222F4B7B377)
##  Quality and Innovation 
We understand what it means to bear the name of the nation’s No. 1 hospital, which is why we deliver patient care that meets Mayo Clinic's standards for safety and quality. 
[View Our Recognitions](https://www.mayoclinichealthsystem.org/about-us/quality-and-safety-recognitions)
## What’s Happening In the Community
[ ![Spoon in mashed potatoes](https://www.mayoclinichealthsystem.org/-/media/national-files/images/hometown-health/2022/spoon-in-mashed-potatoes.jpg?sc_lang=en&la=en&h=370&w=660&hash=90F86D2AD9E2DF1DA979E353B97C9A2C) ](https://www.mayoclinichealthsystem.org/hometown-health/speaking-of-health/its-ok-to-say-yes-to-potatoes)
###  [It's OK to say 'yes' to potatoes](https://www.mayoclinichealthsystem.org/hometown-health/speaking-of-health/its-ok-to-say-yes-to-potatoes)
Potatoes have gotten a bad rap for their carb content. Learn why they're good for you, and get recipes to bring the comfort of potatoes to a healthy diet.
June 10, 2025
[ ![Two people working](https://www.mayoclinichealthsystem.org/-/media/national-files/images/hometown-health/2023/two-people-working.jpg?sc_lang=en&la=en&h=370&w=660&hash=D3DFA084B3E726992D8A40DB95A76AA3) ](https://www.mayoclinichealthsystem.org/hometown-health/speaking-of-health/maintaining-healthy-relationships-is-important-as-we-age)
###  [Maintaining healthy relationships with age](https://www.mayoclinichealthsystem.org/hometown-health/speaking-of-health/maintaining-healthy-relationships-is-important-as-we-age)
Maintaining relationships and strong social networks as you age can contribute to a longer, healthier life. Read why having positive relationships is as important for health as nutrition and exercise.
May 15, 2025
[ ![Charlie Pierce](https://www.mayoclinichealthsystem.org/-/media/national-files/images/hometown-health/2023/charlie-pierce.jpg?sc_lang=en&la=en&h=370&w=660&hash=E27E7E6364E5DBCF9B72A3613FDB697D) ](https://www.mayoclinichealthsystem.org/hometown-health/patient-stories/improved-hearing-aids-career-change)
###  [The sound of success: How improved hearing aids career change](https://www.mayoclinichealthsystem.org/hometown-health/patient-stories/improved-hearing-aids-career-change)
Charlie Pierce was ready to make a career change, but hearing loss was an obstacle to being accepted for the new position. Learn how his Audiology team gave him a fresh start with a small pair of hearing aids.
May 1, 2025
[ ![Cutting yellow pepper on board](https://www.mayoclinichealthsystem.org/-/media/national-files/images/hometown-health/2022/cutting-yellow-pepper-on-board.jpg?sc_lang=en&la=en&h=370&w=660&hash=E395BE23D1380389C9F5EA3463010C3D) ](https://www.mayoclinichealthsystem.org/hometown-health/speaking-of-health/eating-healthy-on-a-budget)
###  [Eating healthy on a budget](https://www.mayoclinichealthsystem.org/hometown-health/speaking-of-health/eating-healthy-on-a-budget)
Food budget getting squeezed? These tips can help you save money without pinching your healthy eating goals.
April 24, 2025
[ ![Produce aisle shopping](https://www.mayoclinichealthsystem.org/-/media/national-files/images/hometown-health/2021/produce-aisle-shopping.jpg?sc_lang=en&la=en&h=370&w=660&hash=E15066B54596D902619EF1C5FD5C5B2D) ](https://www.mayoclinichealthsystem.org/hometown-health/speaking-of-health/want-to-ease-chronic-inflammation)
###  [Want to reduce chronic inflammation? Start with your grocery list](https://www.mayoclinichealthsystem.org/hometown-health/speaking-of-health/want-to-ease-chronic-inflammation)
Chronic inflammation can damage your body, but eating a combination of healthy foods can reduce its effects. Learn what foods to choose when you shop.
![Susan Block, R.D.](https://www.mayoclinichealthsystem.org/-/media/shared-files/images/medical-professionals/full/eau-claire/susan-block-rd.JPG?sc_lang=en&la=en&h=24&w=26&hash=567CC2A14C42C20FDEF482AEE0FF844C) By [Susan Block](https://www.mayoclinichealthsystem.org/providers/susan-block-rd) April 24, 2025
[ ![Know Your Numbers Cholesterol](https://www.mayoclinichealthsystem.org/-/media/national-files/images/hometown-health/2021/know-your-numbers-cholesterol.jpg?sc_lang=en&la=en&h=370&w=660&hash=F96189FACAF20B9522F67CE4E6B7998E) ](https://www.mayoclinichealthsystem.org/hometown-health/speaking-of-health/know-your-numbers-cholesterol)
###  [Know your numbers: Cholesterol](https://www.mayoclinichealthsystem.org/hometown-health/speaking-of-health/know-your-numbers-cholesterol)
You can lower your risk of heart disease, stroke and peripheral artery disease by keeping your cholesterol at normal levels. Here's what you need to know.
April 24, 2025
[ ![Two children eating watermelon](https://www.mayoclinichealthsystem.org/-/media/national-files/images/hometown-health/2021/two-children-eating-watermelon.jpg?sc_lang=en&la=en&h=370&w=660&hash=2F86B9BA1F1E553626851BF9A0D28107) ](https://www.mayoclinichealthsystem.org/hometown-health/speaking-of-health/the-wonders-of-watermelon)
###  [The wonders of watermelon](https://www.mayoclinichealthsystem.org/hometown-health/speaking-of-health/the-wonders-of-watermelon)
Watermelon is a staple at many summertime picnics and gatherings around the country. While most people agree watermelon tastes good, a majority are unaware of the many health benefits this wonderful fruit contains.
![Kristi Wempen RDN](https://www.mayoclinichealthsystem.org/-/media/shared-files/images/medical-professionals/full/mankato/kristi-wempen-rdn.jpg?sc_lang=en&la=en&h=24&w=26&hash=C8B621051FCD7F73BFAE4B791005632E) By [Kristi Wempen](https://www.mayoclinichealthsystem.org/providers/kristi-wempen-rdn) April 24, 2025
[ ![Egg yolk running on toast](https://www.mayoclinichealthsystem.org/-/media/national-files/images/hometown-health/2024/egg-yolk-running-on-toast.jpg?sc_lang=en&la=en&h=370&w=660&hash=1786636AD3892FE1C98B49BC2A132944) ](https://www.mayoclinichealthsystem.org/hometown-health/speaking-of-health/is-it-healthy-to-eat-eggs-every-day)
###  [Is it healthy to eat eggs every day? Crack open the facts](https://www.mayoclinichealthsystem.org/hometown-health/speaking-of-health/is-it-healthy-to-eat-eggs-every-day)
Are you weighing the health benefits of eggs? Learn what nutrients are packed inside the shell and how eggs can be a healthy, versatile choice for any meal of the day.
April 24, 2025

<style type="text/css">input[type="checkbox"][name="mayo-preferences"] {
  -webkit-appearance: checkbox;
  -moz-appearance: checkbox;
  -ms-appearance: checkbox;
  -o-appearance: checkbox;
  appearance: checkbox;
}
.mayo-privacy-popup {
  border-radius: 10px;
  background-color: #3c3a35;
  bottom: 50px;
  max-width: 800px;
}
.mayo-privacy-popup .mayo-close-btn {
  color: #fff;
}
@media screen and (max-width: 767px) {
  .mayo-privacy-popup {
    bottom: 0;
    border-radius: 0;
  }
}
.mayo-privacy-popup > p {
  color: #EDEDED;
}
.mayo-privacy-popup > p a {
  color: #fff;
}
@media screen and (max-width: 767px) {
  .mayo-privacy-popup > p {
    font-size: 13px !important;
  }
}
.mayo-priv-pref {
  background-color: #fff;
  border: 1px solid #000;
  box-shadow: 5px 5px 5px rgba(128, 128, 128, 0.6);
  top: 3%;
}
.mayo-priv-pref .mayo-close-btn {
  color: #3c3a35;
}
.mayo-priv-pref:after {
  position: fixed;
  content: "";
  top: 0;
  left: 0;
  bottom: 0;
  right: 0;
  background: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.5);
  z-index: -2;
}
.mayo-priv-pref:before {
  position: absolute;
  content: "";
  top: 0;
  left: 0;
  bottom: 0;
  right: 0;
  background: #FFF;
  z-index: -1;
}
@media screen and (max-width: 767px) {
  .mayo-priv-pref {
    bottom: inherit;
    top: 0;
  }
}
.mayo-priv-pref h2 {
  color: #a9a8a5;
  font-size: 18px;
  text-align: center;
}
.mayo-priv-pref p {
  font-size: 13px;
  padding-bottom: 10px;
}
.mayo-priv-pref .mayo-privacy-box {
  border-top: 2px solid #a9a8a5;
  margin: 8px 0;
  padding: 5px 0;
  display: flex;
}
.mayo-priv-pref .mayo-privacy-box > div {
  margin-top: 18px;
}
.mayo-priv-pref .mayo-privacy-box > div label, .mayo-priv-pref .mayo-privacy-box > div .label {
  font-family: Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;
  font-size: 16px;
  font-weight: bold;
  color: #000;
  margin: 0 0 3px 8px;
  line-height: 24px;
  padding: 0;
}
@media screen and (max-width: 767px) {
  .mayo-priv-pref .mayo-privacy-box > div label, .mayo-priv-pref .mayo-privacy-box > div .label {
    font-size: 13px !important;
  }
}
.mayo-priv-pref .mayo-privacy-box > div label + p, .mayo-priv-pref .mayo-privacy-box > div .label + p {
  margin: 0 0 0 8px;
}
.mayo-priv-pref .mayo-privacy-box h3 {
  display: inline-block;
  font-size: 16px;
  font-weight: bold;
}
.mayo-priv-pref .mayo-privacy-box.btns {
  text-align: right;
  padding-top: 18px;
  margin-bottom: 0;
}
.mayo-privacy-popup,
.mayo-priv-pref {
  box-sizing: border-box;
  padding: 20px 25px 20px 20px;
  position: fixed;
  max-width: 700px;
  left: calc( (100% - 700px) / 2 );
  z-index: 3000000;
}
.mayo-privacy-popup .mayo-close-btn,
.mayo-priv-pref .mayo-close-btn {
  cursor: pointer;
  position: absolute;
  top: 8px;
  right: 8px;
  font-weight: bold;
  font-size: 16px;
  background-color: transparent;
  border: none;
  height: 20px;
  width: 20px;
}
.mayo-privacy-popup[aria-hidden="true"],
.mayo-priv-pref[aria-hidden="true"] {
  display: none;
}
.mayo-privacy-popup h3,
.mayo-priv-pref h3 {
  font-family: Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;
  font-size: 16px;
  margin: 0 0 13px;
  color: #111;
  font-weight: bold;
  line-height: 24px;
  margin: 0;
  padding: 0;
}
.mayo-privacy-popup h2,
.mayo-priv-pref h2 {
  font-family: Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;
  font-size: 22px;
  margin: 0 0 13px;
  color: #111;
  line-height: 26px;
  margin: 0;
  padding: 0;
}
.mayo-privacy-popup h2.hide-title,
.mayo-priv-pref h2.hide-title {
  border: 0;
  clip: rect(0 0 0 0);
  height: 1px;
  margin: -1px;
  overflow: hidden;
  padding: 0;
  position: absolute;
  width: 1px;
}
.mayo-privacy-popup p,
.mayo-priv-pref p {
  font-family: Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;
  font-size: 16px;
  display: block;
  line-height: 24px;
  margin: 5px 0;
  padding: 0;
}
@media screen and (max-width: 767px) {
  .mayo-privacy-popup p,
  .mayo-priv-pref p {
    font-size: 13px !important;
  }
}
.mayo-privacy-popup a,
.mayo-priv-pref a {
  text-decoration: underline;
}
.mayo-privacy-popup a:hover,
.mayo-priv-pref a:hover {
  color: #fff;
  text-decoration: underline;
}
.mayo-privacy-popup .mayo-primary-button,
.mayo-priv-pref .mayo-primary-button {
  border-radius: 14px;
  padding: 14px 28px;
  text-align: center;
  font-family: Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;
  font-size: 16px;
  line-height: 24px;
  height: auto;
  letter-spacing: initial;
  font-weight: normal;
  text-transform: none
}
.mayo-privacy-popup .mayo-primary-button,
.mayo-priv-pref .mayo-primary-button {
  background-color: #003da5;
  border: 1px solid #003da5;
  color: #fff;
}
.mayo-privacy-popup .mayo-primary-button:focus,
.mayo-priv-pref .mayo-primary-button:focus {
  border: 1px solid #fff;
}
.mayo-privacy-popup .mayo-primary-button:hover,
.mayo-priv-pref .mayo-primary-button:hover {
  cursor: pointer;
}
.mayo-privacy-popup .mayo-button-container,
.mayo-priv-pref .mayo-button-container {
  overflow: hidden;
  text-align: right;
}
@media screen and (max-width: 767px) {
  .mayo-privacy-popup .mayo-button-container,
  .mayo-priv-pref .mayo-button-container {
    margin-top: 12px;
    text-align: left;
  }
}
@media screen and (max-width: 767px) {
  .mayo-privacy-popup,
  .mayo-priv-pref {
    width: 100%;
    max-width: inherit;
    left: 0;
    -webkit-transform: inherit;
    transform: inherit;
    margin-left: 0;
  }
}
@media screen and (max-width: 767px) {
  .mayo-priv-pref {
    margin-left: 0;
    position: fixed;
    top: 0;
    width: 100%;
  }
}



html[lang="ar"] .mayo-privacy-popup .mayo-button-container, html[lang="ar"] .mayo-priv-pref .mayo-button-container {
	text-align: right;
}

@media screen and (max-width: 767px) {
	html[lang="ar"] .mayo-privacy-popup .mayo-button-container, html[lang="ar"] .mayo-priv-pref .mayo-button-container {
		text-align: left;
	}
}

html[lang="ar"] .mayo-privacy-popup .mayo-close-btn, html[lang="ar"] .mayo-priv-pref .mayo-close-btn {

}

Specialty caremade personal.

Appointment Requests

Schedule your appointment now for safe, in-person care or take advantage of our virtual care options.
Request an Appointment

Heart Health

Show your heart some love with cardiovascular care. From prevention to treatment, get the exact care you need.
Love Your Heart

Video visits 24/7/365

Our new mobile app connects you with a provider anytime, day or night, including weekends and holidays.

Why Choose Mayo Clinic Health System

Mayo Clinic Care

By working together and sharing the knowledge and expertise that only Mayo Clinic can provide, we bring the experience and specialized care of Mayo Clinic to you.

Convenient

Every aspect of your care is coordinated, and teams of experts work together to provide exactly the right care at the right time in the right place.

Close to Home

With so many locations, you won’t have to travel far to get the care you need; some care can even be delivered through virtual appointments.

Diverse and Inclusive Care

We're committed to transformational change to reduce health care disparities and create an empowered, diverse and inspired workforce who are dedicated to the health and well-being of our communities.
Learn About Our Values

Quality and Innovation

We understand what it means to bear the name of the nation’s No. 1 hospital, which is why we deliver patient care that meets Mayo Clinic's standards for safety and quality.
View Our Recognitions

What’s Happening In the Community

It's OK to say 'yes' to potatoes

Potatoes have gotten a bad rap for their carb content. Learn why they're good for you, and get recipes to bring the comfort of potatoes to a healthy diet.

June 10, 2025

Maintaining healthy relationships with age

Maintaining relationships and strong social networks as you age can contribute to a longer, healthier life. Read why having positive relationships is as important for health as nutrition and exercise.

May 15, 2025

The sound of success: How improved hearing aids career change

Charlie Pierce was ready to make a career change, but hearing loss was an obstacle to being accepted for the new position. Learn how his Audiology team gave him a fresh start with a small pair of hearing aids.

May 1, 2025

Eating healthy on a budget

Food budget getting squeezed? These tips can help you save money without pinching your healthy eating goals.

April 24, 2025

Want to reduce chronic inflammation? Start with your grocery list

Chronic inflammation can damage your body, but eating a combination of healthy foods can reduce its effects. Learn what foods to choose when you shop.

By Susan Block April 24, 2025

Know your numbers: Cholesterol

You can lower your risk of heart disease, stroke and peripheral artery disease by keeping your cholesterol at normal levels. Here's what you need to know.

April 24, 2025

The wonders of watermelon

Watermelon is a staple at many summertime picnics and gatherings around the country. While most people agree watermelon tastes good, a majority are unaware of the many health benefits this wonderful fruit contains.

By Kristi Wempen April 24, 2025

Is it healthy to eat eggs every day? Crack open the facts

Are you weighing the health benefits of eggs? Learn what nutrients are packed inside the shell and how eggs can be a healthy, versatile choice for any meal of the day.

April 24, 2025

These technologies are used to make advertising messages more relevant to you. They perform functions like preventing the same ad from continuously reappearing, ensuring that ads are properly displayed for advertisers and selecting advertisements that are based on your interests.

# **Specialty care** made personal.
[![Woman typing at laptop](https://www.mayoclinichealthsystem.org/-/media/health-system-internet/components/navigation-cards/homepage/request-an-appointment.jpg?sc_lang=en&la=en&h=300&w=450&hash=37814EF7721C055B516F857AB0AAACF4)](https://www.mayoclinichealthsystem.org/request-appointment "Request an Appointment")
##  Appointment Requests 
Schedule your appointment now for safe, in-person care or take advantage of our virtual care options. 
[Request an Appointment](https://www.mayoclinichealthsystem.org/request-appointment "Request an Appointment")
[![Person leaning against wire fence smiling.](https://www.mayoclinichealthsystem.org/-/media/health-system-internet/components/navigation-cards/homepage/heart-health.jpg?sc_lang=en&la=en&h=300&w=450&hash=0CBB2EEA555FCBF30B4AC6D371FC7FB3)](https://www.mayoclinichealthsystem.org/services-and-treatments/cardiology)
##  Heart Health 
Show your heart some love with cardiovascular care. From prevention to treatment, get the exact care you need. 
[Love Your Heart](https://www.mayoclinichealthsystem.org/services-and-treatments/cardiology)
##  Video visits 24/7/365 
Our new mobile app connects you with a provider anytime, day or night, including weekends and holidays. 
##  Why Choose Mayo Clinic Health System 
###  Mayo Clinic Care 
By working together and sharing the knowledge and expertise that only Mayo Clinic can provide, we bring the experience and specialized care of Mayo Clinic to you. 
###  Convenient 
Every aspect of your care is coordinated, and teams of experts work together to provide exactly the right care at the right time in the right place. 
###  Close to Home 
With so many locations, you won’t have to travel far to get the care you need; some care can even be delivered through virtual appointments. 
![Diverse and Inclusive Care](https://www.mayoclinichealthsystem.org/-/media/health-system-internet/components/ad-cards/diverse-and-inclusive-care.jpg?sc_lang=en&la=en&h=310&w=510&hash=07C2F763B030D7EFF1C62C124A31DA54)
##  Diverse and Inclusive Care 
We're committed to transformational change to reduce health care disparities and create an empowered, diverse and inspired workforce who are dedicated to the health and well-being of our communities. 
[Learn About Our Values](https://www.mayoclinichealthsystem.org/about-us/diverse-and-inclusive-care "Diverse and Inclusive Care")
![Quality and Innovation](https://www.mayoclinichealthsystem.org/-/media/health-system-internet/components/ad-cards/quality-and-innovation.jpg?sc_lang=en&la=en&h=310&w=510&hash=FC36C2186BD485FB4B086222F4B7B377)
##  Quality and Innovation 
We understand what it means to bear the name of the nation’s No. 1 hospital, which is why we deliver patient care that meets Mayo Clinic's standards for safety and quality. 
[View Our Recognitions](https://www.mayoclinichealthsystem.org/about-us/quality-and-safety-recognitions)
## What’s Happening In the Community

Schedule your appointment now for safe, in-person care or take advantage of our virtual care options. 
[Request an Appointment](https://www.mayoclinichealthsystem.org/request-appointment "Request an Appointment")
[![Person leaning against wire fence smiling.](https://www.mayoclinichealthsystem.org/-/media/health-system-internet/components/navigation-cards/homepage/heart-health.jpg?sc_lang=en&la=en&h=300&w=450&hash=0CBB2EEA555FCBF30B4AC6D371FC7FB3)](https://www.mayoclinichealthsystem.org/services-and-treatments/cardiology)
##  Heart Health 
Show your heart some love with cardiovascular care. From prevention to treatment, get the exact care you need. 
[Love Your Heart](https://www.mayoclinichealthsystem.org/services-and-treatments/cardiology)
##  Video visits 24/7/365 
Our new mobile app connects you with a provider anytime, day or night, including weekends and holidays. 
##  Why Choose Mayo Clinic Health System 
###  Mayo Clinic Care 
By working together and sharing the knowledge and expertise that only Mayo Clinic can provide, we bring the experience and specialized care of Mayo Clinic to you. 
###  Convenient 
Every aspect of your care is coordinated, and teams of experts work together to provide exactly the right care at the right time in the right place. 
###  Close to Home 
With so many locations, you won’t have to travel far to get the care you need; some care can even be delivered through virtual appointments. 
![Diverse and Inclusive Care](https://www.mayoclinichealthsystem.org/-/media/health-system-internet/components/ad-cards/diverse-and-inclusive-care.jpg?sc_lang=en&la=en&h=310&w=510&hash=07C2F763B030D7EFF1C62C124A31DA54)
##  Diverse and Inclusive Care 
We're committed to transformational change to reduce health care disparities and create an empowered, diverse and inspired workforce who are dedicated to the health and well-being of our communities. 
[Learn About Our Values](https://www.mayoclinichealthsystem.org/about-us/diverse-and-inclusive-care "Diverse and Inclusive Care")
![Quality and Innovation](https://www.mayoclinichealthsystem.org/-/media/health-system-internet/components/ad-cards/quality-and-innovation.jpg?sc_lang=en&la=en&h=310&w=510&hash=FC36C2186BD485FB4B086222F4B7B377)
##  Quality and Innovation 
We understand what it means to bear the name of the nation’s No. 1 hospital, which is why we deliver patient care that meets Mayo Clinic's standards for safety and quality. 
[View Our Recognitions](https://www.mayoclinichealthsystem.org/about-us/quality-and-safety-recognitions)
## What’s Happening In the Community

###  [It's OK to say 'yes' to potatoes](https://www.mayoclinichealthsystem.org/hometown-health/speaking-of-health/its-ok-to-say-yes-to-potatoes)
Potatoes have gotten a bad rap for their carb content. Learn why they're good for you, and get recipes to bring the comfort of potatoes to a healthy diet.
June 10, 2025
[ ![Two people working](https://www.mayoclinichealthsystem.org/-/media/national-files/images/hometown-health/2023/two-people-working.jpg?sc_lang=en&la=en&h=370&w=660&hash=D3DFA084B3E726992D8A40DB95A76AA3) ](https://www.mayoclinichealthsystem.org/hometown-health/speaking-of-health/maintaining-healthy-relationships-is-important-as-we-age)
###  [Maintaining healthy relationships with age](https://www.mayoclinichealthsystem.org/hometown-health/speaking-of-health/maintaining-healthy-relationships-is-important-as-we-age)
Maintaining relationships and strong social networks as you age can contribute to a longer, healthier life. Read why having positive relationships is as important for health as nutrition and exercise.
May 15, 2025
[ ![Charlie Pierce](https://www.mayoclinichealthsystem.org/-/media/national-files/images/hometown-health/2023/charlie-pierce.jpg?sc_lang=en&la=en&h=370&w=660&hash=E27E7E6364E5DBCF9B72A3613FDB697D) ](https://www.mayoclinichealthsystem.org/hometown-health/patient-stories/improved-hearing-aids-career-change)
###  [The sound of success: How improved hearing aids career change](https://www.mayoclinichealthsystem.org/hometown-health/patient-stories/improved-hearing-aids-career-change)
Charlie Pierce was ready to make a career change, but hearing loss was an obstacle to being accepted for the new position. Learn how his Audiology team gave him a fresh start with a small pair of hearing aids.
May 1, 2025
[ ![Cutting yellow pepper on board](https://www.mayoclinichealthsystem.org/-/media/national-files/images/hometown-health/2022/cutting-yellow-pepper-on-board.jpg?sc_lang=en&la=en&h=370&w=660&hash=E395BE23D1380389C9F5EA3463010C3D) ](https://www.mayoclinichealthsystem.org/hometown-health/speaking-of-health/eating-healthy-on-a-budget)
###  [Eating healthy on a budget](https://www.mayoclinichealthsystem.org/hometown-health/speaking-of-health/eating-healthy-on-a-budget)
Food budget getting squeezed? These tips can help you save money without pinching your healthy eating goals.
April 24, 2025
[ ![Produce aisle shopping](https://www.mayoclinichealthsystem.org/-/media/national-files/images/hometown-health/2021/produce-aisle-shopping.jpg?sc_lang=en&la=en&h=370&w=660&hash=E15066B54596D902619EF1C5FD5C5B2D) ](https://www.mayoclinichealthsystem.org/hometown-health/speaking-of-health/want-to-ease-chronic-inflammation)
###  [Want to reduce chronic inflammation? Start with your grocery list](https://www.mayoclinichealthsystem.org/hometown-health/speaking-of-health/want-to-ease-chronic-inflammation)
Chronic inflammation can damage your body, but eating a combination of healthy foods can reduce its effects. Learn what foods to choose when you shop.
![Susan Block, R.D.](https://www.mayoclinichealthsystem.org/-/media/shared-files/images/medical-professionals/full/eau-claire/susan-block-rd.JPG?sc_lang=en&la=en&h=24&w=26&hash=567CC2A14C42C20FDEF482AEE0FF844C) By [Susan Block](https://www.mayoclinichealthsystem.org/providers/susan-block-rd) April 24, 2025
[ ![Know Your Numbers Cholesterol](https://www.mayoclinichealthsystem.org/-/media/national-files/images/hometown-health/2021/know-your-numbers-cholesterol.jpg?sc_lang=en&la=en&h=370&w=660&hash=F96189FACAF20B9522F67CE4E6B7998E) ](https://www.mayoclinichealthsystem.org/hometown-health/speaking-of-health/know-your-numbers-cholesterol)
###  [Know your numbers: Cholesterol](https://www.mayoclinichealthsystem.org/hometown-health/speaking-of-health/know-your-numbers-cholesterol)
You can lower your risk of heart disease, stroke and peripheral artery disease by keeping your cholesterol at normal levels. Here's what you need to know.
April 24, 2025
[ ![Two children eating watermelon](https://www.mayoclinichealthsystem.org/-/media/national-files/images/hometown-health/2021/two-children-eating-watermelon.jpg?sc_lang=en&la=en&h=370&w=660&hash=2F86B9BA1F1E553626851BF9A0D28107) ](https://www.mayoclinichealthsystem.org/hometown-health/speaking-of-health/the-wonders-of-watermelon)
###  [The wonders of watermelon](https://www.mayoclinichealthsystem.org/hometown-health/speaking-of-health/the-wonders-of-watermelon)
Watermelon is a staple at many summertime picnics and gatherings around the country. While most people agree watermelon tastes good, a majority are unaware of the many health benefits this wonderful fruit contains.
![Kristi Wempen RDN](https://www.mayoclinichealthsystem.org/-/media/shared-files/images/medical-professionals/full/mankato/kristi-wempen-rdn.jpg?sc_lang=en&la=en&h=24&w=26&hash=C8B621051FCD7F73BFAE4B791005632E) By [Kristi Wempen](https://www.mayoclinichealthsystem.org/providers/kristi-wempen-rdn) April 24, 2025
[ ![Egg yolk running on toast](https://www.mayoclinichealthsystem.org/-/media/national-files/images/hometown-health/2024/egg-yolk-running-on-toast.jpg?sc_lang=en&la=en&h=370&w=660&hash=1786636AD3892FE1C98B49BC2A132944) ](https://www.mayoclinichealthsystem.org/hometown-health/speaking-of-health/is-it-healthy-to-eat-eggs-every-day)
###  [Is it healthy to eat eggs every day? Crack open the facts](https://www.mayoclinichealthsystem.org/hometown-health/speaking-of-health/is-it-healthy-to-eat-eggs-every-day)
Are you weighing the health benefits of eggs? Learn what nutrients are packed inside the shell and how eggs can be a healthy, versatile choice for any meal of the day.
April 24, 2025
